```{r}
#load all data into a single dataframe
filenames = list.files(path = "data/")

data_df = 
  map(filenames, ~read_csv(file.path("data/", .)))

#combine data
complete_data = bind_rows(data_df) |> 
  mutate(
    filenames = filenames,
    treatment = case_when(
      filenames %in% "con" ~ "control",
      filenames %in% "exp" ~ "experimental"))
    

```
